mapper.select: SELECT f.* ,s.LastSeq as "StorageLastSeq" ,s.FilePath as "StorageFilePath" ,s.InlinePath ,s.IsActive FROM covi_smart4j.sys_file f JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_storage s on s.StorageID = f.StorageID WHERE FileID = #{FileID};

SELECT s.StorageID ,s.DomainID ,s.ServiceType ,s.LastSeq ,s.FilePath ,s.InlinePath ,s.IsActive ,s.Description ,s.RegistDate ,s.Reserved1 ,s.Reserved2 ,s.Reserved3 ,s.Reserved4 ,s.Reserved5 ,d.DomainCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_storage s join covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain d on s.domainid = d.domainid
ORDER BY s.DomainID DESC

SELECT s.StorageID ,s.DomainID ,s.ServiceType ,s.LastSeq ,s.FilePath ,s.InlinePath ,s.IsActive ,s.Description ,s.RegistDate ,s.Reserved1 ,s.Reserved2 ,s.Reserved3 ,s.Reserved4 ,s.Reserved5 ,d.DomainCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_storage s join covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain d on s.domainid = d.domainid WHERE s.StorageID = #{storageId}
